commands.usage: set <player: string> <group: string> [length: string] | addperm <player: string> <permission: string> | remperm <player: string> <permission: string>

commands.description: View how much time you've spent on the server
See the last time a player was on the server!
Broadcasts the given message as the sender
Logs chat for printing in RCON

application.message_start:
Application started, Please answer the following questions for the {type} application.
At any time you can type cancel to stop or skip to skip a question.
application.message_end: Your application has been submitted. Thanks for applying for {type} on {server_name}.

staff: How old are you?
What is your in game name?
What alts have you used on Versai? This will be checked so be honest.
What platforms do you play on? (Console, iOS, Android, Windows 10)
What country are you from?
What is your current country of residence?
What is your time zone?
What languages can you fluently speak?
Have you ever been banned on Versai? If so, list the banned IGN(s) and the reason(s).
Are you currently staff elsewhere? If so, what server(s) and what rank do you hold.
Whats your availiability? Please list an estimate of the hours you can play each day of the week.
Is your device capable of recording Minecraft footage?
Name three staff members who you believe do their job well and explain why you have selected them. (If you only know 1-2 staff members then name them)
Name three staff members that you believe are not doing a good job and state the reasons.
Are you able to help bring additional players to Versai? If so, how?
What do you like most about Versai and why?
What do you dislike most about Versai and why? (There's no right or wrong answer, we use this information to make our server a better place for the community, so be honest.)
If you could change on thing about Versai, what would it be?
Why do you want to be staff on Versai?
You're on the server and reports are coming in rapidly. You noticed staff are casually playing on the server in disguise. What would you do?
You're being messaged by two players. One is asking for you to teleport to a hacker and the other is swearing at you for no reason. What would you do?
If you are in a 1v1, and a player tells you that the person they're fighting is suspicious, what would you do?
You've become good friends with a staff member. One day they duel you and you suspect they are cheating. What would you do?
A staff member sends you a message on discord asking for you to ban a player, what would you do?
Do you have any past server moderation experience on other servers?
What does being staff mean to you?
Illustrate your Minecraft history. (When did you start playing, Why did you start playing it? What made you come to Versai?)
What else should we know about you?
builder: What is your in game name?
What platforms do you play on? (Console, iOS, Android, Windows 10)
What languages can you fluently speak?
What is your current country of residence?
Are you familiar with World Edit or Blocksniper?
Why do you want to be a builder?
Why should we choose you to be a builder?
Have you been/are a Builder for any other server(s)? If so, name the server(s).
What is your preferred build style?
What would you say is your biggest strength in building?
Describe a map you could build that we might use.
Link some of your builds below, these must have been created without the assistance of others.
What else should we know about you?
famous: Please link us your social media account that you'd like to get famous from.
Please link content promoting Versai, typically a youtube video.

Please send us a link to your account on socialblade. https://socialblade.com/ (If on an unsupported platform you can skip however if you are on an unsupported platform you're unlikely to be accepted.)
